timeline.bodyText: @kaikalur  was related to bucketing, I believe this was from @yingsu00

@@ -0,0 +1,8 @@

+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix an issue where queries with both ``COALESCE`` and ``FULL OUTER JOIN`` may produce incorrect

replies.author: kaikalur

replies.bodyText: @kaikalur Gotcha. Can you rephrase this to be user-facing. User do not understand what is "bucket pruning". Me neither :)
replies.author: caithagoras

replies.bodyText:
Bucketing is a Hive fix, so this should go to Hive changes, right?
Fix an issue where queries with the predicate IS NULL on bucketed columns would always return 0 results. ?
replies.author: mayankgarg1990

replies.bodyText: Fix incorrect results returned when selecting from a bucketed table with bucket predicate is NULL
replies.author: bhhari
